title: Visual Gap Closure Enhances Download Stats UI

topics.title: Internationalization Enhancements
topics.summary: Merged PR #1628 introduces missing German translations for various i18n keys, enhancing accessibility for German-speaking users. This update ensures that the application is more inclusive and user-friendly for a broader audience.

topics.title: Performance Improvements
topics.summary: Merged PR #1642 focuses on enhancing the caching mechanism for packuments, which is crucial for improving performance and efficiency in data retrieval. This change aims to optimize the overall user experience by reducing load times and resource consumption.

topics.title: User Interface Fixes
topics.summary: Merged PR #1639 addresses a visual issue by fixing a blank gap on the collapsed weekly downloads section. This enhancement improves the user interface, ensuring a more polished and user-friendly experience for users interacting with the download statistics.

topics.title: Community Engagement on Bluesky
topics.summary: Recent posts on Bluesky highlight community engagement, including a guide on moving accounts to npmx.social and discussions about the npm ecosystem. These interactions foster a sense of community and collaboration among developers and users.
